full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM GCOD KYI MAN NGAG SNYING GI MUN SEL RIN CHEN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,CES ZAB LAM GCOD KYI MAN NGAG SNYING GI MUN SEL RIN CHEN SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHYEN PA DANG BRTZE BA SOGS YON TAN DU MAS THUGS RGYUD KHYUG PA SKU MDUN DAR HAN MKHAN PO BSKAL BZANG YON TAN DANG, MCHOD DPON SDE DRUG MKHAN PO BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYI 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS YUL SKYED GRONG GI RI KHROD PA YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
